methods.name: transferOwnership
methods.desc: Transfers the ownership of the contract to a new owner.Requires the caller to be the current owner.

args.name: newOwner
args.desc: The address of the new owner.

methods.name: deploy
methods.desc: Deploy a partner channel, setting the owner as provided

methods.name: update
methods.desc: Allows the owner to update the smart contract

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc: Destroy the smart contract, sending all Algo to the owner account. This can only be done if there are no active card funds

methods.name: setWithdrawalTimeout
methods.desc: Set the number of seconds a withdrawal request must wait until being withdrawn

args.name: seconds
args.desc: New number of seconds to wait

methods.name: setEarlyWithdrawalPubkey
methods.desc: Sets the early withdrawal public key.

methods.name: partnerChannelCreate
methods.desc: Creates a partner channel account and associates it with the provided partner channel name.Only the owner of the contract can call this function.

args.name: mbr
args.desc: The PayTxn object representing the payment transaction.

args.name: partnerChannel
args.desc: The name of the partner channel.

returns.desc: The address of the newly created partner channel account.

methods.name: cardFundCreate
methods.desc: Create account. This generates a brand new account and funds the minimum balance requirement

args.name: mbr
args.desc: Payment transaction of minimum balance requirement

args.name: asset
args.desc: Asset to opt-in to. 0 = No asset opt-in

returns.desc: Newly generated account used by their card

methods.name: cardFundClose
methods.desc: Close account. This permanently removes the rekey and deletes the account from the ledger

args.name: cardFundOwner
args.desc: Address which has control over asset withdrawals

methods.name: cardFundRecover
methods.desc: Recovers funds from an old card and transfers them to a new card.Only the owner of the contract can perform this operation.

args.name: partnerChannel
args.desc: The partner channel associated with the card funds

args.name: oldCardHolder
args.desc: The address of the old card holder.

args.name: newCardHolder
args.desc: The address of the new card holder.

methods.name: assetAllowlistAdd
methods.desc: Allows the master contract to flag intent of accepting an asset.This can be considered the whitelists whitelist.

args.name: mbr
args.desc: Payment transaction of minimum balance requirement

args.name: asset
args.desc: The AssetID of the asset being transferred.

methods.name: assetAllowlistRemove
methods.desc: Allows the master contract to reject accepting an asset.

args.name: asset
args.desc: The AssetID of the asset being transferred.

methods.name: cardFundDebit
methods.desc: Debits the specified amount of the given asset from the card account.Only the owner of the contract can perform this operation.

args.name: card
args.desc: The card account from which the asset will be debited.

args.name: amount
args.desc: The amount of the asset to be debited.

methods.name: cardFundRefund
methods.desc: Refunds a specified amount of an asset to a card account.Only the owner of the contract can perform this operation.

args.name: card
args.desc: The card account to refund the asset to.

args.name: amount
args.desc: The amount of the asset to refund.

methods.name: setSettlementAddress
methods.desc: Sets the settlement address to a new value.

args.name: newSettlementAddress
args.desc: The new settlement address to set.

methods.name: settle
methods.desc: Settles a payment by transferring an asset to the specified recipient.Only the owner of the contract can call this function.

args.name: amount
args.desc: The amount of the asset to be transferred.

args.name: nonce
args.desc: The nonce to prevent duplicate settlements.

args.name: nonce
args.desc: Settlement nonce to prevent duplicate settlements

methods.name: cardFundEnableAsset
methods.desc: Allows the depositor (or owner) to OptIn to an asset, increasing the minimum balance requirement of the account

methods.name: cardFundDisableAsset
methods.desc: Allows the depositor (or owner) to CloseOut of an asset, reducing the minimum balance requirement of the account

args.name: partnerChannel
args.desc: The funding channel associated with the card.

args.name: asset
args.desc: The ID of the asset to be removed.

methods.name: cardFundWithdrawalRequest
methods.desc: Allows the Card Holder (or contract owner) to send an amount of assets from the account

returns.desc: Withdrawal hash used for completing or cancelling the withdrawal

args.name: timestamp
args.desc: Timestamp that must be reached before withdrawal can be completed

methods.name: cardFundWithdrawalCancel
methods.desc: Allows the Card Holder (or contract owner) to cancel a withdrawal request

methods.name: cardFundWithdraw
methods.desc: Allows the Card Holder to send an amount of assets from the account

methods.name: cardFundWithdrawEarly
methods.desc: Withdraws funds before the withdrawal timestamp has lapsed, by using the early withdrawal signature provided by Immersve.

args.name: partnerChannel
args.desc: The partner channel associated with the card.

events.name: OwnershipTransferred
events.desc: Event emitted when ownership of the contract is transferred.

args.name: nonce
args.desc: Settlement nonce to prevent duplicate settlements

args.name: timestamp
args.desc: Timestamp that must be reached before withdrawal can be completed
